useCase.name: Manage Order Information

preconditions.precondition: User has access to the Order Information Page

useCase.trigger: User accesses the Order Information Page

mainSequence.step: User accesses the Order Information Page
Request for Order Details Page is sent to Controller
Controller fetches Order Details from Model
Model queries Database for Order Information
Database returns Order Information to Model
Model sends Order Details to Controller
Controller displays Order Details on Order Information Page
